TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit JsonSerializer extends System.Object
public ref class JsonSerializer abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供将对象或值类型序列化为 JSON 以及将 JSON 反序列化为对象或值类型的功能。

span.span: Provides functionality to serialize objects or value types to JSON and to deserialize JSON into objects or value types.

param.span: 分析期间用于控制行为的选项。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的不如使用 utf-8 方法, 因为实现本身使用 utf-8。Using a is not as efficient as using the UTF-8 methods since the implementation natively uses UTF-8.

summary.span: 从提供的读取器读取一个 JSON 值（包括对象或数组）并将它转换为指定类型的实例。

span.span: Reads one JSON value (including objects or arrays) from the provided reader and converts it into an instance of a specified type.
A representation of the JSON value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果的 `reader`属性为 或, 则通过调用来使读取器前进, 以确定值的开头。If the property of `reader` is or , the reader will be advanced by one call to to determine the start of the value. 此方法完成后, `reader`将位于 JSON 值中的最终标记处。Upon completion of this method, `reader` will be positioned at the final token in the JSON value. 如果引发了异常, 则读取器将重置为在调用方法时它所处的状态。If an exception is thrown, the reader is reset to the state it was in when the method was called. 此方法会创建读取器所处理的数据的副本, 因此, 不需要在返回此方法之后维护数据完整性。This method makes a copy of the data the reader acted on, so there is no caller requirement to maintain data integrity beyond the return of this method. 用于创建实例的的在冲突时优先于。The used to create the instance of the take precedence over the when they conflict. 因此, 在读取时使用、、和。Hence, , , and are used while reading.

span.span: is .

exception.span: Json 无效， 与 JSON 不兼容，或者无法从读取器读取值。

span.span: The JSON is invalid, is not compatible with the JSON, or a value could not be read from the reader.

exception.span: 使用的是不受支持的选项。

span.span: is using unsupported options.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果的 `reader`属性为 或, 则通过调用来使读取器前进, 以确定值的开头。If the property of `reader` is or , the reader will be advanced by one call to to determine the start of the value. 此方法完成后, `reader`将位于 JSON 值中的最终标记处。Upon completion of this method, `reader` will be positioned at the final token in the JSON value. 如果引发了异常, 则读取器将重置为在调用方法时它所处的状态。If an exception is thrown, the reader is reset to the state it was in when the method was called. 此方法会创建读取器所处理的数据的副本, 因此, 不需要在返回此方法之后维护数据完整性。This method makes a copy of the data the reader acted on, so there is no caller requirement to maintain data integrity beyond the return of this method. 用于创建实例的的在冲突时优先于。The used to create the instance of the take precedence over the when they conflict. 因此, 在读取时使用、、和。Hence, , , and are used while reading.
